channel.title: Design Analysis on Jörn Alexander Quent's notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Design Analysis on Jörn Alexander Quent's notebook

item.title: Design analysis for noveltyVR
item.description: Aim of this document Instead of frequentist statistics as planned previously, we decided to use a Bayesian framework more specifically a Sequential Bayesian Factor (SBF) analysis to examine whether the experience of novelty can enhance memory for unrelated information. Nevertheless, I also report the power analysis that I ran, in which I am determining the necessary sample size to find an effect with a power of 95 % based on the results of Fenker et al.
